mapper.insert: insert into tape(user_id, title, description, img) values (#{user.userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{img.saveFile})
mapper.sql: select tape_key, count(*) as popular from user_like_tape group by tape_key
mapper.select: select *, popular from tape a left outer join user b on a.user_id = b.user_id left outer join () c on a.tape_key = c.tape_key order by c.popular desc, createtime desc limit ${n}
select * , popular from tape a left outer join user b on a.user_id = b.user_id left outer join () c on a.tape_key = c.tape_key order by createtime desc limit ${n}

select *, popular from tape a left outer join user b on a.user_id = b.user_id left outer join () c on a.tape_key = c.tape_key
limit ${start}, ${countPerPage}
mapper.delete: delete from user_like_tape where user_id=#{userId} and tape_key=#{tapeKey}
